item.title: HELP! Me PLZ
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

Add this void, [code]public void RulesMenu()
{

				sendQuest("@dre@RulesMenu", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@dbl@--------------------------", 8145);
				sendQuest("@dbl@--------------------------------", 8146);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@~~~@dbl@", 8147);
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@--------------------------------- ", 8148);		                                        
                                    sendQuest("@gre@---------------------------------", 8149);
				sendQuest("@dre@------------------------", 8150);
                                    sendQuest("@blu@---------------------------", 8151);
                                    sendQuest("@red@---------------------------", 8152);
                                    sendQuest("@red@---------------------------", 8153);
                                    sendQuest("@red@---------------------------", 8154);
				sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
                               }[/code] Put whatever rules you want to the places where is --------'s and add this command

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules")) { RulesMenu(); }
